name: Nameless Project
description:
The world is full of  artful magic, mythical creatures and dangerous forces.

 A kingdom in which the nobility of the knights coexist with the suffering of the poor and the intrigues of aristocrats. 

Everyone wants the dreams becomes true. That is why the mysterious magic tower, that can fulfil any desire, attracts various creatures to itself from the whole world.

The story about deception, betrayal, and redemption.
